title: What are the deposit and withdrawal limits of my eC-Savings by Cebuana Lhuillier Rural Bank?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

Know the deposit and withdrawal limits of your eC-Savings by Cebuana Lhuillier Rural Bank account here:

|     |     |     |     |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **Transaction Type** | **Limit per Transaction** | **Daily Limit** | **Monthly Limit** |
| Deposit | PHP 50,000 | PHP 100,000 | No Monthly Limit |
| Withdrawal | PHP 50,000 | PHP 50,000 | PHP 100,000 |

To learn more about GSave Deposit and Withdrawal limits, please visit [GCash Wallet and Transaction Limits.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360021112894-GCash-Wallet-and-Transaction-Limits)
